awards:
第73届威尼斯电影节(2016)
　　路易吉·德·劳伦蒂斯奖（新锐导演奖） 阿拉埃迪·斯莱姆

writer.name: 阿拉埃迪·斯莱姆 Ala Eddine Slim

director.name: 阿拉埃迪·斯莱姆 Ala Eddine Slim

introduction: N is crossing the desert to reach the north of Africa and make an illegal crossing to Europe. After a robbery, he finds himself left alone in Tunisia.Finally, he decides to cross the sea alone towards a European country. He will steal a boat and begin his journey, except that the ship breaks down in the middle of the sea.From that moment on, N will undergo a special and unique voyage, he will discover different and infinite spaces, will have intense and fleeting encounters, and will meet another altered image of himself.
